VEC.Q: How many slices are there in this pie chart?
VEC.A: There are {6} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the clockwise direction from slice Car Rentals?
SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Car Rentals is {Vacation Rentals}.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the counterclockwise direction from slice Car Rentals?
SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Car Rentals is {Storage Rentals}.

VPR.Q: Which rental has the largest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The rental with the largest proportion is {Storage Rentals}.

VPR.Q: Which rental has the smallest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The rental with the smallest proportion is {Event Space Rentals}.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Car Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Car Rentals slice is {20}%.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Storage Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Storage Rentals slice is {23}%.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Vacation Rentals slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Vacation Rentals slice is {18}%.

What is the minimum value in this pie chart?

SC.Q: What is the difference between the values of Vacation Rentals and Event Space Rentals in this pie chart?
SC.A: The difference between Vacation Rentals and Event Space Rentals is {9}%.

SC.Q: What is the sum of the values of Car Rentals and Equipment Rentals in this pie chart?
SC.A: The sum of Car Rentals and Equipment Rentals is {37}%.

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart exceed 19.5%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {Storage Rentals} accounts for {23}% and {Car Rentals} accounts for {20}%

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart are below 14.0%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {Residential Rentals} accounts for {13}% and {Event Space Rentals} accounts for {9}%

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Storage Rentals, Car Rentals, or Vacation Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Storage Rentals} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Storage Rentals or Car Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Storage Rentals} is larger.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Storage Rentals, Car Rentals, Vacation Rentals, or Residential Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Storage Rentals} is the largest.

MSR.Q: How many sectors have a percentage between 3% and 20%?
MSR.A: There are {5} sectors that have a percentage between 3% and 20%.

MSR.Q: Which three sectors have a sum of percentage less than 45%? List all possible combinations.
MSR.A: The possible combinations are: {(Car Rentals, Residential Rentals, Event Space Rentals), (Vacation Rentals, Equipment Rentals, Event Space Rentals), (Vacation Rentals, Residential Rentals, Event Space Rentals), (Equipment Rentals, Residential Rentals, Event Space Rentals)}.
